name: Rocket Pig
description:
Help Rocket Rig collect stars and avoid comets! Try to fuel up as fast as you can and collect stars to achieve your highest score. Catch various powerups to help Rocket Pig glide through the galaxy sky.

Rocket Pig Features:
- Tap alternatively on the tap buttons to fuel up as fast as you can in 3 seconds
- Tilt side to side to avoid the comets, grab stars and catch powerups
- Global leaderboards now available
- Smooth graphics and animations
- Fun and catchy music
